fields.description: URL for the resource representing the project last editor
The level of exposure the project has to potential attackers.
The username who updated the project setting
URL for the resource representing the project creator
Whether BOM level adjustments are applied at the project level (to all releases)
Summary of what the project represents in terms of functionality and use
Meta data associated with the representation, as described in <<metadata,Meta Data>>
The match depth when custom signature is enabled for the project
The date/time when the project was created
The username who created the project
The general identifier of the project
URL for the resource representing the project owner
The set of categories of data to clone when creating a new project version.
If the project should be matched against for future scans
The date/time when the project settings were last updated

links.description: Resource listing versions associated with project
Resource representing the canonical version of the project, if specified
Resource representing users assignable to the project
Resource representing user groups assignable to the project
Resource representing users assigned to the project
Resource representing user groups assigned to the project
Resource representing application identifier(s) mapped to the project
Resource representing the journal for the project
Resource representing the project's custom fields
